strong.a:
You can now receive
Text Messaging Alerts
From N.I.S.D!!

p.span:
Neches ISD currently utilizes a notification system to call and email parents concerning attendance, lunch balances, emergency alert, and other various messages. You now can choose to receive those same nonfictions in a text message.
We will send a message to you requesting that you “opt in” to receive NISD notifications. The message will come from the code 68453 and read similar to this:
“Neches ISD messages, Reply Y to subscribe or STOP to cancel. Msg & data rates may apply. Msg frequency varies.”
We encourage you to reply with Y when you receive the message from 68453. You will not receive notifications via text unless you “opt in”. You will continue to receive calls and emails.
Please look for the “opt in” message during the first week of school, August 27th through August 31st. You may also go ahead and text Y to 68453 from your cell phone now.

div.div: County Road 346, Neches, TX 75779 | Phone 903-584-3311 | Fax 903-584-3686
